gameplay loop is basically fly to a station get a mission fly to the mission destroy everything fly back to next station next mission kill everything rinse and repeat  there is a half baked trade system and a half baked bounty system to give you some more money to upgrade ship but still fly somewhere kill shit go back to station  gets boring after a couple hour or so

a fun casual space sim the story is minimal but the gameplay makes up for it it has a gradual progression system the combat is enjoyable and you can choose to just coast through the galaxy with country music playing in the background
if you like grinding non stop and killing space scum while you jam out to the same song for hours non stop then this is the game for you  9 out of 10

this is an incredibly fun game it reminds me of the old escape velocity series but it is more of a space western the combat is fun the soundtrack is phenomenal unfortunately i didnt feel any incentive to do anything outside combat missions as they seemed to be the fastest and funnest way to improve yourself by a long shot but it was so fun i didnt care this game scratches an itch that is hard to reach give it a try you will spend long hours in some pretty epic space battles

too bad its not coop so you can play with a few friends n form fleets together  also build n design different n better ships
